hero.name: Mohamed Aziz Abidi
hero.title: Software Engineer
hero.description: Passionate about creating innovative solutions through code. I specialize in mobile and web development with a focus on modern technologies and user experience.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Get to know more about who I am, what I do, and my current skills
about.description: I'm a dedicated software engineer with a passion for creating innovative digital solutions. Currently pursuing my 5th year at ESPRIT, I combine academic excellence with practical industry experience gained through multiple internships.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: A collection of my work across internships and academic projects

leaveManagement.title: Leave Management Mobile App
leaveManagement.description: Developed a mobile leave management application to streamline and simplify employee leave requests. Implemented automated workflows for employees, managers, and HR, covering request submission, approval, and refusal processes. Designed and built an admin feature for managing employee accounts and email notifications.

vehicleParts.title: Vehicle Spare Parts Management
vehicleParts.description: Developed a cross-platform mobile and web application for managing vehicle spare parts, focusing on improving traceability of transactions including sales, purchases, and stock management. Designed and implemented role-based access control with personalized features to meet client-specific needs.

crowdSourcing.title: Crowd Sourcing Mobile App
crowdSourcing.description: Designed and developed a cross-platform app for crowd sourcing in Tunisia. Built intuitive UI using Flutter; integrated Node.js for backend operations. Delivered a prototype tested by internal stakeholders with positive UX feedback.

healthChain.title: HealthChain App
healthChain.description: Developed a blockchain-based platform to securely manage and share personal health data with full patient control. Enabled decentralized medical record storage, smart contract-based access permissions, and cryptographic identity verification. Integrated cross-system interoperability with hospital systems and real-time prescription tracking. Designed an AI-powered chatbot acting as a personal nurse, providing guidance based on patient health records and treatment history. Implemented token-based health service payments to enhance transparency and incentivize healthcare providers.

chicCercle.title: ChicCercle - ShopeMate App
chicCercle.description: Built an AI-powered shopping assistant app with real-time product scanning, personalized recommendations, and price comparison features.

affariety.title: AFFARIETY - E-learning Platform
affariety.description: Developed an online learning platform with user authentication, course management, and an admin dashboard for tracking student progress.

cinema.title: Cinema Booking Website
cinema.description: Developed a responsive cinema website allowing users to browse films, view showtimes, and book tickets online.

game2d.title: 2D Game Development
game2d.description: Programmed a C-based 2D game using SDL; included score tracking and collision detection.

skills.title: Skills & Technologies
skills.subtitle: My comprehensive technical toolkit spanning multiple domains

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Feel free to reach out for collaborations or just a friendly hello
contact.description: I'm always open to discussing new opportunities, innovative projects, or potential collaborations. Whether you have a question about my work or want to explore working together, I'd love to hear from you.
